main.name: Alex Montague
main.description: I am in my third year of schooling, and I am always looking for
main.description2: Whether that be open source projects, internships, or new technologies,
main.bio: I am a software engineer. This doesn't just mean I like to program, but rather I am passionate about writing clean, smart, and efficient code! Over my schooling and work terms I have been exposed to many languages and frameworks, but some of my favourite languages are Javascript, C and Java. I have recently begun my dive into web development, more specifically using the ReactJS/NodeJS libraries. I hope to explore more full stack opportunities in the future!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Currently in my third year studying Software Engineering. Some of the most intesting/favourite courses I have taken so far have been Software Design I - IV, Data Structures, Algorithms, Operating Systems and the infamous 'Angel of Death' (Software Systems and Integrations). Currently on the Dean's List for maintaining an overall average of 80%. Currently looking forward to my databases and software design V class.
Highschool is where I took my first programming class, and I'm glad I did! Graduated as an Ontario Scholar and maintained an overall average of 95% in all CIS courses.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
